why.title: Why - our purpose
why.description: We believe that everyone deserves to live with dignity and independence in their own homes. Our mission is to give elderly people security and their families peace of mind in everyday life, while providing caregivers with reliable tools to deliver the best possible care.

how.title: How - our approach
how.description: Our technology is discreet, reliable and trustworthy. We use sensors, a gateway and a cloud solution that monitors patterns and sends alerts only when action is needed. This ensures safety without unnecessary disruptions.

what.title: What - our solutions
solutions: Bed sensors that detect presence, movement and activity patterns
Gateway that sends data securely without extra user effort
Cloud solution that analyzes signals in real time
Alerts and dashboards for families, municipalities and healthcare personnel

benefits.title: Benefits
items: For families: peace of mind in everyday life
For caregivers: clear and actionable alerts, not noise
For municipalities: a scalable solution that reduces costs for institutional care

cta1.title: Ready to make your home safer?

questions.question: Is it difficult to install?
questions.answer: No, you can install the solution yourself. We provide you with all necessary guidance.

questions.question: What does it cost?
questions.answer: Solutions start from approximately 299 NOK per month, depending on chosen sensors/services.

questions.question: Do we need internet?
questions.answer: Yes, internet is necessary for alerts and data sharing. We can help with suggestions if it's not available.

questions.question: Is the data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, data is stored on servers in Norway and follows strict privacy requirements (GDPR and DPIA).
